long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPT Translator is a super cool Chrome plugin that helps you translate text into any language you want using the most advanced artificial intelligence technology. With just an OpenAI account, this plugin allows you to translate massive amounts of text quickly and efficiently!

What sets ChatGPT Translator apart from other translation tools is its awesome feature of contextual translation. In other words, it not only looks at individual words, but also the entire sentence to ensure accuracy and coherence in meaning.

Best of all, the interface of this plugin is extremely user-friendly and easy to use, even for those who aren't tech-savvy. If you're a professional or entrepreneur who frequently communicates with people who speak different languages, ChatGPT Translator is definitely an essential tool for you!
